title: League just wont work
body: League just wont work I login and get a black screen its so annoying I could use some help

replies.body: ok I got it fixed thx for that kinda late reply but I really appreciate it love yah rito gimme 5

Generally, when I've seen this in this in the past, it's been caused by the client not being able to load assets from the server. The most common reason this happens is due to an unstable connection to the servers. You can find the most common solutions for this in our [connection guide. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Please let me know if you have any questions.
